website_summaries.verdict: We love that this shampoo contains natural plant-based ingredients from the orchid plant to keep color looking great. Made by a trusted, premium hair care company.
pros: Contains orchid botanicals that help prevent color from fading
Cleanses gently without stripping, thanks to the low pH formula that's best for colored hair
May reduce frizz for some users
cons: A few repeat customers voice concerns that the formula has changed, and it's not quite as effective as it use to be

customer_reviews.title: Amazon sent me a knock off...
customer_reviews.text: Be careful buying this item. The first time I bought this shampoo it was in fact Biolage. However the one I just bought 12/18 was a knock off and damaged my hair, left it oily and greasy. So I would not recommend Biolage through Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer W.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have dark hair with balayage so I have to get it tones frequently to avoid brasiness. I feel that this shampoo actually keeps my ashy color looking ashy for longer and keeps away the brassy tones! Is is also not drying and keeps my scalp looking healthy. customer_reviews.title: Possibly counterfit product, delivered without protective seal & leaking
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this product before (from Amazon) and liked it. My most recent order however was leaking all over the place when I opened the box. 2 of 4 bottles had their caps cracked open and leaking. None of the 4 bottles had the protective seal under the cap that they should have. The caps were taped down, but that did not prevent leaking and makes me worry that the product has been tampered with. The style of the cap and the label are different than before (I would like to upload an image but that appears to be disabled for this item?). There is no "Matrix" brand name on the bottle I received, and no label about no parabens.

product_meta.title: BIOLAGE Colorlast Shampoo | Helps Protect Hair & Maintain Vibrant Color | For Color-Treated Hair
product_meta.description:
Size:33.8 Fl Oz

Let your true color shine. Colorlast formulas are inspired by the anti-fade properties of the vibrant orchid help protect hair, balance moisture and even out the hair’s surface for saturated, shiny, vibrant color that stays truer.
Color treated hair can fade and lose its luster over time. Cue the BIOLAGE Colorlast Shampoo - a professional hair treatment product essential for maintaining colored hair health and repairing hair damage. 
This nourishing shampoo protects hair from environmental damage and strengthens hair while hydrating. BIOLAGE Colorlast Shampoo helps maintain the color depth, tone and shine for vivid color treated hair. 
Low pH shampoo for color treated hair helps prolong color vibrancy. Gently cleanses to prevent unnecessary stripping of color.
Paraben-free formula is suitable for color treated and natural hair.



BRAND STORY
Professional By Nature. Honest By Choice. A recognized leader in professional haircare, BIOLAGE offers high-quality, stylist-favorite products powered by botanicals.
